articles.author: Katherine Donlevy
articles.title: American Airlines workers on leave after kicking black passengers off flight over body odor complaint - New York Post
articles.description: It’s unclear how many of the American Airlines workers involved in the fiasco were placed on leave.
articles.content:
American Airlines has placed several employees on leave after the company was sued by three black New Yorkers who were kicked off a JFK-bound flight over a body odor complaint.

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Lionel Messi Scripts Copa America History As Argentina Begin Title Defence With 2-0 Win vs Canada - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Lionel Messi, the eight-time Ballon d'Or winner who turns 37 on Monday, is captaining Argentina in what is surely his final edition of the continental championship.
articles.content: World champions Argentina opened their bid for back-to-back Copa America titles with a 2-0 win over Canada in front of a crowd of 70,564 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium on Thursday. Julian Alvarez put Argen… [+3669 chars]
